definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: They differ in solubility and chemical reactivity.
sentences.chinese: 它们在溶解度和化学反应活性上有差别。

sentences.english: Its solubility and supersaturation were determined under various conditions.
sentences.chinese: 测定其在各种不同条件下的溶解度和过饱和度。

sentences.english: The pyrocatechol content of EPW solution affects the solubility obviously.
sentences.chinese: 邻苯二酚的含量对此溶解度有明显影响。

sentences.english: The solubilities were determined with the use of a micro gas absorbing apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 利用微量气体吸收器测定了这些溶解度。

sentences.english: The solubility of some elements and compounds is dependent upon the redox potential and pH of their environment.
sentences.chinese: 有些原素和化合物的溶解度取决于其氧化还原能力和。

sentences.english: Secondly, the hardness of water also affects the solubility of the active ingredient of tea.
sentences.chinese: 第二，水的硬度也影响到茶叶的有效成分的溶解度。

sentences.english: The method of solubility parameter was used to predict miscibility of polymer blends.
sentences.chinese: 用三维溶解度参数方法预测聚合物共混物的相容性。

sentences.english: The solubility of Natamycin is very low in water and in most organic solvents.
sentences.chinese: 纳他霉素在水中和多数有机溶剂中的溶解度很低。

sentences.english: The solubility and dissolution of drug nanoparticles were also investigated.
sentences.chinese: 并研究纳米化齐墩果酸的溶解度及体外溶出行为。

sentences.english: Objective To increase the solubility of nimodipine in glucose solution.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高尼莫地平在注射液中的溶解度。

sentences.english: The solubility of these magnesium borates has obtained at varied temperature.
sentences.chinese: 测得这三种镁硼酸盐在不同温度下的溶解度。

sentences.english: The solubility of the organic Zn source with medium complexed was in the low statue at all times.
sentences.chinese: 中络合强度有机锌的锌溶解度一直处于较低的状态。

sentences.english: The theory of thermodynamics is one of effective methods to discuss the solubility of substances.
sentences.chinese: 热力学原理是讨论物质溶解度的有效方法之一。

sentences.english: Nitrogen, for example, is less soluble in water than CO2.
sentences.chinese: 举例来说，氮气在水中的溶解度小于二氧化碳。

sentences.english: The Solubility of sodium sulfate in supercritical water was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究硫酸钠在超临界水中的溶解度。

sentences.english: Solubilities of the complexes in ethyl alcohol at 25℃ have also been determined.
sentences.chinese: 已测定所合成络合物在乙醇中的溶解度。
